```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(fgeo)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r functions}
#' @importFrom dplyr filter select arrange mutate group ungroup %>%
has_concept <- function(string) {
  fgeo:::search_help() %>% 
    filter(.data$concept %in% string) %>% 
    collapse_alias() %>% 
    link_topic() %>% 
    select(columns())
}

columns <- function() {
  c("alias", "topic", "title")
}

collapse_alias <- function(x) {
  x %>% 
    group_by(topic) %>% 
    mutate(name = paste0(unique(alias), collapse = ", ")) %>% 
    ungroup()
}

link_topic <- function(x, base = "https://forestgeo.github.io/") {
  x %>% 
    mutate(
      topic = glue::glue_data(
        ., "<a href={base}{package}/reference/{topic}>{topic}</a>"
      ),
      package = glue::glue_data(
        ., "<a href={base}{package}>{package}</a>"
      )
    ) %>% 
    dplyr::arrange(package)
}

datatable_n <- function(x, n = nrow(x)) {
  DT::datatable(x, escape = FALSE, options = list(pageLength = n))
}

```

### Help

```{r}
datatable_n(has_concept("functions to explore fgeo"))
```

```{r}
fgeo:::search_help("fgeo.map") %>%
```

### Datasets

```{r}
fgeo_x <- fgeo:::search_help("fgeo.x") %>% 
  collapse_alias() %>% 
  link_topic() %>% 
  select(columns()) %>% 
  unique()
family_datasets <- has_concept("datasets")
all_datasets <- suppressWarnings(dplyr::bind_rows(fgeo_x, family_datasets))

datatable_n(all_datasets)
```
